website_summaries.verdict: This wakeboard design is preferred by beginners and intermediate riders.
pros: Two molded-in fins with continuous rocker
Clean, crisp graphics and V-bottom tunnel
Feather core technology with lightest bottoms
ABS fin block and retention steps
cons: Advanced riders will want a board that allows more loose control

website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a solid wakeboard that's suitable for riders of all abilities, this model should make your shortlist. It gives a smooth and stable ride.
pros: We love the long, defined channels that increase stability
Continuous rocker makes for a smooth wakeboarding experience
cons: The 140-centimeter length is better suited to teens than younger children

customer_reviews.title: Company doesn't make parts
customer_reviews.text: We loved the wakeboard. However, the first time we used it, we lost a bolt that holds the boot. I contacted the company and they don't have parts. So we used it one time, and we are out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Gran

customer_reviews.title: Great Board - buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Lightweight and high quality. Just buy it. My wife got up first pull and was very skeptical because of the 155 lb spec. She is 135 lbs and skied on it beautifully. She said, "that board is fine" aka let me translate. "That board is awesome" I never get the true story. Buy it and enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Wakeboarding vs. Wakesurfing... our feet won’t stay in the bindings!
customer_reviews.text: We’re beginner wakeboarders... but I’m pretty sure that the lace locks should keep the bindings on your feet. 30% of the time we’re having to cut the ride short because people’s feet are coming out of the bindings. Rides fine aside from the fact that our feet won’t stay locked in.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher H

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Fits my kids 11-19 and all are getting up successfully.
customer_reviews.author: IceMan

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a great deal. I wanted to get back to wakeboarding (normally just water ski) but didn’t want to break the bank. Bindings fit me great, easy to get out of the water and ride. Would recommend for any beginner or casual rider who wants an inexpensive board. I’m 6’, 230, size 13 shoe, board was perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Brett hucka

customer_reviews.title: Great board for price
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t wake boarded in years and decided to get this board because of its price being a lot lower than others. The boots already come pre assembled and you can rotate them to fit every riders needs. I’m 150 pounds and it rode really well. Carved great and glided just fine. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R

customer_reviews.title: Nice board, mediocre boots
customer_reviews.text: The pull string tightening system of the boots is not very good. They create too much tightness on some parts of the riders foot and not enough tightness on other parts. As a result, the boots are not comfortable and/or not very secure during the ride.
customer_reviews.author: JRogers

customer_reviews.title: Nice wakeboard at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Great wakeboard and binding package for beginner to intermediate riders. 1st timers from 140 lbs to 255 lbs were able to ride this board without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: JTL

customer_reviews.title: Great all Purpose Board
customer_reviews.text: Seems good, we were able to get up on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: Native Dawg

customer_reviews.title: wakeboard
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this thing! has been very easy for my kids and other kids to get up and learn on. Just a great overall beginner board
customer_reviews.author: gtg

customer_reviews.title: Boots don’t fit men’s size 12
customer_reviews.text: I wear a mens size 12 shoe and my toes hung over the edge of the boots and therefore returned it immediately after I realized my feet didn’t fit the boots.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great wake board bought for my brother and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: RegAly

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner board
customer_reviews.text: I take my daughter out to a cable wakeboarding park, she has really started getting into so I got this for her as a beginner board. It has been great. The price point was great, the bindings are alittle chintzy but they have lasted the entire summer of hard use so I really can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Kodiak

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Got up on it first pull
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Got up on it first pull. No one else in the family had ever been on one and they were all doing great by the end of the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: This is a great board at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great board at a great price. The boots fit great across a wide variety of foot sizes. We're all beginners on my boat, so I couldn't tell you whether it's good for tricks or experts.
customer_reviews.author: Rick H.

customer_reviews.title: Board is pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Boots ripped out on second use. Board is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Great board and bindings!
customer_reviews.text: This board is beautiful and the boots are super comfortable and easy to get in and out of. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Binding holes not drilled correctly
customer_reviews.text: This product was highly ranked online, but the holes were drilled incorrectly. I am sending it back because I am unable to adjust my bindings.
customer_reviews.author: Jason D Nofziger

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my husbands birthday and was very nervous ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husbands birthday and was very nervous as I could not ask for his advice and have it be a surprise. No worries--he got up on the first try --FIRST TIME EVER WAKEBOARDING. Worked exactly as it should. No problems adjusting boots, no issues with riding wakes.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With This Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy With This Purchase. Great board! My husband and friends had a blast on it the same day we received it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Burman

customer_reviews.title: Boot lace troubles
customer_reviews.text: Fine wake board for the price and as a beginner don’t know any better. But one boot the lace clasp broke after two uses.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler lakeberg

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value full size wakeboard with solid bindings
customer_reviews.text: At under a bill when I purchased (and even at almost twice that price - which is similar to used prices of major brand boards with bindings) this is a fantastic value. Easy to control, bindings feel great with good support, and the ride is nice! I am no expert, but I've ridden on expensive boards in the past, and as I'm just now getting back into it years later, this has been fantastic to rediscover wakeboarding. I've only just started having control riding switch, landing 180s and coming close to jumping wake to wake, but I don't feel like this board is holding me back in the least. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Good little board for sure
customer_reviews.text: BEGINNER BOARD ONLY!!!!!!! If you are an intermediate to advance Wakeboader DO NOT BUY THIS BOARD. Good little board for sure, but if you want something with pop and more loose control, spend the extra couple hundred bucks on a good brand board.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: Full Throttle Aqua Extreme Wakeboard Kit (Black/Blue, 55.1 x 21.6-Inch/ 140cm x 42cm)
product_meta.description: The Full Throttle Aqua extreme wakeboard with lace-up boots, design for all levels of wakeboarders but especially preferred by beginner/intermediate riders. The Aqua extreme has multiple defined channels that run from the tip to the nose for increased stability and edge control. This board has a continuous Rocker to effortlessly lift you off the wake and provides a more mellow turn. Appropriate for riders 155 lbs. And up.`
feature_bullets: Black/grey Aqua extreme wakeboard with lace-up boots
Layered glass top Sheet/two molded-in fins with continuous rocker
Feather core technology/lightest bottoms/ABS retention steps/reinforced ABS fin block
Length: 140 cm/55.1", width: 42 cm/16.5", rocker: 2.5" continuous boots are included with the wakeboard

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
